TA0002.title: Scalpers
TA0002.description: In the gray/black market, scalpers refer to individuals or organizations that seek excessive profits through illegitimate means. In ticketing, they obtain tickets for popular events through illegal means and resell them at inflated prices, often using automated bots to bulk-purchase tickets. In other domains, scalpers may acquire limited-edition goods such as shoes or electronics through illegitimate means and resell them at a premium.
